Metadata.Title: 1352 - Detection of Error Condition Without Action

Content.Data:
Content for CWE ID: 390

Checkmarx Rule

QueryId : 1352
Cwe : 390
IsExecutable : true
IsEncrypted : false
Severity : 0
PackageId : 1277
Status : Original
Type : Regular

Source

 CxList Catch = All.FindByType(typeof(Catch));
foreach(CxList curCatch in Catch)
{
	Catch ch = curCatch.data.GetByIndex(0) as Catch;
	if(ch.Statements.Count == 0)
	{
		result += curCatch;
	}
}
